info.title: Springwolf example project - Kafka
info.description: Springwolf [example project](https://github.com/springwolf/springwolf-core/tree/main/springwolf-examples/springwolf-kafka-example) to demonstrate springwolfs abilities, including **markdown** support for descriptions.

schema.description: There can be headers, but they are not explicitly documented.
schema.title: HeadersNotDocumented

schema.description: Payload description using @Schema annotation and @AsyncApiPayload within envelope class

Example payload model demonstrating markdown text styling:
**bold**, *cursive* and <u>underlined</u>

someString.description: ### Some string field with Markdown - **bold** - *cursive* - images: - and code blocks (json, http, java) ```json { "key1":"value1", "key2":"value2" } ```

schema.title: ExamplePayloadDto

schema.description: Payload model with nested complex types
schema.title: NestedPayloadDto

schema.description: Demonstrate required and nullable. Note, @Schema is only descriptive without nullability check

notRequiredField.description: This field can be skipped, but value cannot be null

requiredAndNullableField.description: This field can be skipped, or value can be null or present

requiredButNullableField.description: This field must be present, but value can be null

requiredField.description: This field must be present, and value cannot be null

schema.title: RequiredAndNullablePayloadDto

schema.description: Demonstrates the use of discriminator for polymorphic deserialization (not publishable)
schema.title: VehicleBase

avro-topic_receive_receiveExampleAvroPay.title: avro-topic_receive
avro-topic_receive_receiveExampleAvroPay.description: Requires a running kafka-schema-registry. See docker-compose.yml to start it

multi-payload-topic_receive_receiveMonet.title: multi-payload-topic_receive
multi-payload-topic_receive_receiveMonet.description: Override description in the AsyncListener annotation with servers at kafka:29092

string-topic_receive_receiveStringPayloa.title: string-topic_receive
string-topic_receive_receiveStringPayloa.description: Final classes (like String) can be documented using an envelope class and the @AsyncApiPayload annotation.

topic-defined-via-asyncPublisher-annotat.title: topic-defined-via-asyncPublisher-annotation_send
topic-defined-via-asyncPublisher-annotat.description: Custom, optional description defined in the AsyncPublisher annotation
